title: ATP World Tour Masters 1000 / WTA Premier, Rome Masters Men's Singles Results
text: May 15, 2018 / 1:20 AM / Updated 19 hours ago ATP World Tour Masters 1000 / WTA Premier, Rome Masters Men's Singles Results Reuters Staff 2 Min Read May 15 (OPTA) - Results from the ATP World Tour Masters 1000 / WTA Premier, Rome Masters Men's Singles matches on Monday .. 1st Round .. Robin Haase (NED) beat Daniil Medvedev (RUS) 3-6 6-4 6-1 Fabio Fognini (ITA) beat Gael Monfils (FRA) 6-3 6-1 Kei Nishikori (JPN) beat Feliciano Lopez (ESP) 7-6(5) 6-4 Philipp Kohlschreiber beat Karen Khachanov (RUS) 7-5 6-7(7) (GER) 7-6(6) 11-Novak Djokovic (SRB) beat Alexandr Dolgopolov (UKR) 6-1 6-3 Albert Ramos-Vinolas (ESP) beat Federico Delbonis (ARG) 2-6 7-5 6-1 Aljaz Bedene (SLO) beat Gilles Muller (LUX) 6-4 6-4 10-Pablo Carreno Busta beat Jared Donaldson (USA) 6-4 3-6 6-0 (ESP) Benoit Paire (FRA) beat Richard Gasquet (FRA) 6-4 6-4 Marco Cecchinato (ITA) beat Pablo Cuevas (URU) 2-6 7-5 6-4 9-David Goffin (BEL) beat Leonardo Mayer (ARG) 6-1 6-2 Kyle Edmund (GBR) beat Malek Jaziri (TUN) 6-3 3-6 6-3 Matteo Berrettini (ITA) beat Frances Tiafoe (USA) 6-3 7-6(1)
